author: Kieran Klaassen

text: The first piece of tech my grandpa actually loves. Meet Ato, an AI companion designed for seniors. It's always there to talk, connect them with family, and keep their minds sharp. With @gaspihabif we're giving away 20 prototypes. DM us if your family is in the Bay Area.
